title: To Sleep in a Sea of Stars
description: Listening time: 32 hrs 29 minA brand new space opera on an epic scale from the New York Times bestselling author of a beloved YA fantasy series.It was supposed to be a routine research mission on an uncolonized planet. But when xenobiologist Kira Nav√°rez finds an alien relic beneath the surface of the world, the outcome transforms her forever and will alter the course of human history.Her journey to discover the truth about the alien civilization will thrust her into the wonders and nightmares of first contact, epic space battles for the fate of humankind, and the farthest reaches of the galaxy.
author: Christopher Paolini
